oracle.adf.model.binding.events
Interface EventMapDef

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventMapDefImpl
public interface EventMapDef

A EventMapDefImpl implements this interface Used as RT interface for accessing the Event wiring metadata in pagedef file

See Also:
